decks.notes: The main focus of this Pioneer 1 vs 1 Aggro - Humans deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy. By utilizing cards like Declaration in Stone for removal and Thalia, Guardian of Thraben to disrupt the opponent's spells, the deck aims to keep the pressure on with a mix of efficient creatures like Coppercoat Vanguard and Adeline, Resplendent Cathar. The inclusion of cards like Mutation Specialist and Thalia's Lieutenant also adds to the deck's synergy and ability to quickly build a threatening board presence.

The deck focuses on using Enigmatic Incarnation to sacrifice creatures and search for more powerful ones to control the board. It also includes a toolbox of powerful creatures to play with Enigmatic Incarnation, such as Overlord of the Hauntwoods and Skyclave Apparition. The companion, Yorion, Sky Nomad, adds an extra layer of versatility to the deck with its enter the battlefield ability. The mana base is designed to support the deck's various colors and ensure it can cast its spells consistently.

The deck focuses on using sacrifice synergies, such as Witch's Oven and Cauldron Familiar, to generate value and control the board. It also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Mayhem Devil to disrupt opponents. The Companion, Jegantha, provides additional mana ramp and a potential finisher. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of aggressive creatures like Ygra, Eater of All and disruptive spells like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker. The mana base is designed to support consistent casting of both black and red spells.

The deck focuses on using a variety of multicolored spells and cards to control the game, while utilizing Niv-Mizzet Reborn as a key card for card advantage and value. The deck includes efficient removal spells and versatile threats, allowing the player to adapt to different situations and outvalue their opponent. Yorion, Sky Nomad serves as a companion to provide additional resources and flexibility. Overall, the deck aims to outlast the opponent with powerful control elements and high-value cards, ultimately gaining card advantage and overwhelming the opponent.

This deck focuses on utilizing legendary creatures, specifically Overlords, to control the game. It includes powerful removal spells like Fatal Push and Vanishing Verse to deal with threats while using Leyline Binding to further control the board. Zur, Eternal Schemer serves as the centerpiece of the deck, allowing you to search for important enchantments to suit the situation. The mana base is designed to support the various color requirements of the deck's spells, ensuring consistency in casting your spells and maintaining control over the game.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with spells and creatures in order to bring back Arclight Phoenix from the graveyard, allowing for fast and aggressive plays. The deck includes card draw, removal, and counter spells to help maintain tempo and protect key pieces. The deck aims to utilize the synergy between casting spells and returning Arclight Phoenix to the battlefield to create a powerful and efficient aggro strategy. Additionally, the inclusion of Treasure Cruise and Temporal Trespass provides additional card advantage and potential for explosive turns.

This deck focuses on a fast and aggressive playstyle using spirit creatures to overwhelm the opponent. It combines powerful spirit creatures like Spell Queller and Supreme Phantom with disruptive spells like Spell Pierce and Skyclave Apparition to maintain control of the battlefield. The deck also includes cards like Hengegate Pathway and Mutavault to provide flexibility in mana usage and maximize creature count on the board. Overall, this deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain tempo throughout the game to secure a quick victory.
